EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Pat, I wanted to follow up on the below email you submitted to Brendan and introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8xgBLHfKQeY5g8vpJBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQks9uqvEX1W0MFcEVvNSulcasZszH0MacSBi2KyynsEaZxphwlkYcw1cGFTuPkwmmS%5F2jy62SgA3xpy%5Fa94GXuKpNEye5RkHUW4XwSfrHb2y3KwbF8vRYMpPh13ip8x9sjKcs7whuKUBb23rfSVcRjbKOwqProuMoDfi4C2qYaYkzgEGOZX4iVTzty5k7Ry3N%2Ddw%2C%2C/1gwVMIfFNB5UrAli4vGcJrvkiTDSNJuntvNEWtnM8ZAz0lxBZuPEZRP3vfJ6JpgRY9%5FPKhEcJYo21icNMfGXKYtKzt9ZH0CgTBfauJiPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C> You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8xgBLHfKQeY5g8vpJBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQks9uqvEX1W0MFcEVvNSulcasZszH0MacSBi2KyynsEaZxphwlkYcw1cGFTuPkwmmS%5F2jy62SgA3xpy%5Fa94GXuKpNEye5RkHUW4XwSfrHb2y3KwbF8vRYMpPh13ip8x9sjKcs7whuKUBb23rfSVcRjbKOwqProuMoDfi4C2qYaYkzgEGOZX4iVTzty5k7Ry3N%2Ddw%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNEhWoFNjpf6cbbPGuy%5FXSaylnKopVvrtxvAq1kMjIPT6GWrVgvBXKsMZduWoG1UGOMVK0Q4NEeqhVoRU%2D%2DdJJ2SKYW6trbTxWbhdaJ1G%2D%2Dhg852inTMh746m>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8xgBLHfKQeY5g8vpJBkC7VHX8j6yceoRKLOQ12dl17an49VQks9uqvEX1W0MFcEVvNSulcasZszH0MacSBi2KyynsEaZxphwlkYcw1cGFTuPkwmmS%5F2jy62SgA3xpy%5Fa94GXuKpNEye5RkHUW4XwSfrHb2y3KwbF8vRYMpPh13ip8x9sjKcs7whuKUBb23rfSVcRjbKOwqProuMoDfi4C2qYaYkzgEGOZX4iVTzty5k7Ry3N%2Ddw%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyAfjxn8I81gVpff7EKx7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCxjoJMfOZSpoX7N4IIFCwDTD1tIvee4xcZZhW5Pg0rYWw81YwucSrp3vlCEM7RzQ%5FQEPOTQ%2C%2C>. Thanks,Meghan ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Schneider Pat [mailto:pschneider0180@gmail.com <mailto:pschneider0180@gmail.com>] Sent: Tuesday, February 04, 2014 2:15 PM To: Brendan Dillon Cc: Mark Miller; Ciuca Chris Subject: Getting Started HI Brendan,I was given the link to MBO by Mark MIller at SAE International. I've reviewed the video and continued onward at the website, however, Mark mentioned in his last email that he was going to have you intercept my case and get this process expedited as soon as possible. Please refer to his email on which you have been copied. I am and have been a contracted employee for SAE since the late 1980's. I also have a current 2014 contract which needs to be expedited as my work and travel for SAE AWIM begins tomorrow, Feb 5th. Please connect with me today, February 4th if at all possible.Thank youPat Patricia SchneiderEducation Consultant MiPAS ... to Innovative Education17116 Dunblaine AveBeverly Hills, MI 480251.248.561.4683 Mobile pschneider0180@gmail.com <mailto:pschneider0180@gmail.com>
